question:
[Faye] went to the store with her sister [Mary] [Roger] took his sister [Faye] too the zoo but his sister [Jamie] could n't come because she had to work. [Mary], who is the sister of [Faye], is a lovely girl. [Ellen] went to dinner with her daughter [Julie]. They then went to the park afterwards. [Robert]'s mother, [Julie], waited impatiently for him at the diner. [Robert] took his sister [Lisa] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Ellen] watched a golf tournament with her aunt [Faye].
Question: How is [Jamie] related to [Lisa]?
